rules_text: Whenever a creature you control enters from a graveyard, target opponent loses life equal to its power.
flavor_text:
[i]“The hero's eyes fluttered open and met with the cultist's. He felt his chest fill with fear and a lack of heartbeats.”
—Azamir, “Fallen And Risen”[/i]
notes: fluffy: -dashgap, a creature you control enters the battlefield from the graveyard>a creature enters the battlefield under your control from a graveyard
